DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1/2 , open-label , non randomize , multicenter study evaluate safety efficacy rociletinib administer combination trametinib . This study conduct 2 phase : Phase 1 : This dose escalation phase study . Phase 1 determine MAD MTD RP2D combination rociletinib trametinib , evaluate safety tolerability PK profile EGFRm NSCLC patient fail least one prior EGFR TKI . Phase 2 : This dose expansion phase . Phase 2 evaluate preliminary efficacy pharmacodynamics combination rociletinib trametinib RP2D two subset EGFRm NSCLC patient .
